name: Evening Star (2018)
description:
⭐Go to the fairy world of 8-bit and 16-bit epoch, in search of epic adventures in the role of one of the hunters for the Stars. In this world, stars are of great value, but do not forget that not only you are hunting here, other hunters do not slumber.

⭐⭐⭐
⭐This battle arcade game, will help you bring back memories of classic retro games with numerous adventures.
You will meet many diverse enemies and dangerous bosses, beautiful pixel art graphics, good music and sounds.

⭐⭐⭐
⭐A large selection of Heroes with their unique weapons and abilities. The faster you kill enemies, the more the combo counter grows and the more powerful abilities become available to you.

⭐Built-in global table of records, compete with players from all over the world, win all and become the champion!

⭐⭐⭐
⭐FEATURES:
☆ Retro gameplay.
☆ Simple and intuitive operation
☆ Choose from a variety of unique characters.
☆ Each hero has his own abilities.
☆ Strengthen the weapon with the help of combos.
☆ A large number of stages.
☆ Stages in the platformer style and in the stylistics of the raster.
☆ Records tables: compete with players from all over the world.
☆ Beautiful pixel art style.
☆ The game is completely without advertising.

⭐If you like retro, 2D arcade pixel games 8-bit and 16-bit, then this battle arcade for you!

⭐Have a good game!⭐
